caption:
This photograph captures an outdoor scene involving a man engaged in an activity by a large body of water, with an impressive bridge or series of bridges in the background. The man is in a dark boat, leaning over the side, and appears to be pulling a fish out of the water. He is dressed in a relaxed fashion, wearing a striped, short-sleeved shirt and dark pants.

The boat is equipped with various items suggesting a fishing trip, including a visible cooler and yellow ropes. The surrounding environment features calm water and a clear sky, with the well-structured bridges spanning across the water in the background, adding an industrial contrast to the natural setting.

The bridges are multi-leveled with the nearest one consisting of a complex truss structure, painted in white, which enhances its geometric details against the blue sky. Further behind, another bridge, which seems older with a rusty appearance, adds depth to the scene. The photograph beautifully blends elements of human activity, technology, and nature.
title: Local EPA worker on a field trip points out a dying fish at the inner city viaduct area joining Kansas City, KS, and Kansas City, MO.
